short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the new tab screen with wallpapers of the USA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Celebrate your love for the United States with the American Backgrounds Chrome extension! This extension transforms your browsing experience with a touch of American spirit. Here's what you can expect:

National Landmarks: Get rotating wallpapers featuring iconic landmarks from across the USA.

Your new search provider will be Microsoft Bing.
